short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Nudge hides distractions like feeds, related articles and suggested videos to help you focus.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Distractions are hidden by a simple, empty button. To show the distraction, you simply click the button.

What you hide is completely up to you. For every distraction Nudge hides, you have two options:

★ Hide the distraction at all?

★ If hiding, show the button to unhide?

Nudge comes with 14 hidden distractions across 7 sites including X, Facebook, TikTok, Bluesky and YouTube, and we’re rapidly adding to the list.

**Request new sites by emailing [feedback@nudgeware.io](mailto:feedback@nudgeware.io)**

Nudge puts you in the driver's seat so that distractions aren't pushed on you by default. YOU choose when you want to be distracted.

Completely free and fully open source: https://github.com/louisbarclay/nudge

Privacy policy: https://github.com/louisbarclay/nudge/blob/main/privacy-policy.md
